thread.title: Hillary Clinton Slams Trump In Front of His Casino
thread.title_full: Hillary Clinton Slams Trump In Front of His Casino

author: NICHOLAS RICCARDI
title: Hillary Clinton Slams Trump In Front of His Casino
text: Privacy Policy | More Newsletters AP Democratic presidential candidate Hillary Rodham Clinton shakes hands during a rally Monday, Oct. 12, 2015, in Las Vegas. Clinton spoke at a rally held by the Culinary Union to support a union drive at the Trump Hotel. Hillary Rodham Clinton went to Donald Trump's doorstep Monday to mock the Republican presidential front-runner on the eve of the first Democratic presidential debate, the Associated Press reported. Her appearance at a rally of the politically potent Culinary Workers Union was a win-win for Clinton, letting her signal her support for an influential union while taking aim at the Democratic party's favorite foil. The union, which represents casino and resort workers, is trying to organize hotel employees and invited all of the five candidates in town for the debate to the rally.
